code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{Button,Card,Table}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useHistory}from"react-router";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{optenerUsuarios}from"../../redux/actions/usuarios.actions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ListaUsuarios=function ListaUsuarios(){var usuarios=useSelector(function(state){return state.usuarios;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var history=useHistory();useEffect(function(){dispatch(optenerUsuarios());},[]);var handleNew=function handleNew(){return history.push('/page/Usuarios/nuevo');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{bordered:true,striped:true,hover:true,size:"sm",responsive:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:['# Clave','Nombre','Apeidos','Correo','Creado',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{block:true,size:"sm",onClick:handleNew,children:" NUEVO "})].map(function(e,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:e},i);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:usuarios.length>0?usuarios.map(function(value){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:value.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:value.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:value.lastName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:value.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[value.create.slice(0,10)," ",value.create.slice(11,16)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"Edit/".concat(value.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"link",size:"sm",children:"EDITAR"})})})]},value.id);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:" Sin datos a mostrar..."})})})})]});};export default ListaUsuarios;
